last_episode_to_air.name: The Mork Report
last_episode_to_air.overview: Mork bucks hard for a promotion from leader Orson on planet Ork, and unintentionally comes up with a report on how to stay happily married on Earth.

name: Mork & Mindy
overview: An American science fiction sitcom broadcast from 1978 until 1982 on ABC, starring Robin Williams as Mork, an alien who comes to Earth from the planet Ork in a small, one-man egg-shaped spaceship and Pam Dawber as Mindy McConnell, his human friend and roommate. In 1997, the episode 'Mork's Mixed Emotions' was ranked #94 on TV Guide's 100 Greatest Episodes of All Time list.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: This is a list of episodes from the first season of Mork & Mindy.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: This is a list of episodes from the second season of Mork & Mindy.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: This is a list of episodes from the third season of Mork & Mindy.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: This is a list of episodes from the fourth and final season of Mork & Mindy.

episodes.name: Pilot (1)
episodes.overview: Mork's boss, Orson, assigns Mork to study the planet Earth and, shortly after landing in the woods near Boulder, Colorado, he meets Mindy McConnell. Back at Mindy's apartment, she discovers that Mork is an alien, and offers to help him study Earth. In a flashback sequence, Mork tells Mindy about a previous visit to Earth when Fonzie arranged a date for him with Laverne.

episodes.name: Pilot (2)
episodes.overview: Mork continues his story about his date with Laverne. When Mindy's father, Fred, discovers that Mork had moved in with Mindy, Deputy Tilwick offers to scare Mork off. Tilwick believes Mork is insane and tries to have him committed.

episodes.name: Mork Moves In
episodes.overview: After constant hounding from Fred, Mork agrees to move out of Mindy's apartment. But Mork's plans are complicated when he becomes drunk on ginger ale.

episodes.name: Mork Runs Away
episodes.overview: Realizing that his living with Mindy is making it difficult for her to date, Mork decides to move out. While looking for a flop house, he stumbles upon Exidor, the delusional leader (and only tangible member) of 'The Friends of Venus'.

episodes.name: Mork in Love
episodes.overview: When Mindy tells Mork that he has to experience love in order to understand the human experience, he takes her advice and falls head over heels for the lovely Dolly, oblivious to the fact that she's a mannequin.

episodes.name: Mork's Seduction
episodes.overview: A new customer at the music store turns out to be Mindy's old rival, Susan, who promptly sets her sights on Mork, as revenge for Mindy stealing her boyfriend back in high school.

episodes.name: Mork Goes Public
episodes.overview: Mork has a run in with Clint Mullet, a reporter for a tabloid that is offering $25,000 for proof of alien life. After Fred saves Mork's life, Mork decides to turn himself in to pay for Fred's plumbing bills and Mindy's college tuition.

episodes.name: To Tell the Truth
episodes.overview: When Mork tricks Mindy into believing that he can predict the weather, Mindy tells him that he should never lie. The music store's despicable landlord, Arnold Wanker, dies while trying to evict Fred from the music store. Mork, hearing the family try to comfort his widow, assumes that that Wanker is their friend, and brings him back from the dead.

episodes.name: Mork the Gullible
episodes.overview: Mork is jailed for freeing an escaped convict who's captured at the music store. Exidor begins worshiping O.J. Simpson.

episodes.name: A Mommy for Morky
episodes.overview: When Mindy is reunited with her ex-fiance, she wonders what it would be like to raise a family, while Mork wonders what it would have been like to have had a mother. Mork kills two birds with one stone by using his Orkan Age Machine to regress himself to 5 years old.

episodes.name: Mork's Greatest Hits
episodes.overview: Mork meets a bully who wants to dance with Mindy but Mork is opposed to violence. Humility is Mork's weapon.

episodes.name: Old Fears
episodes.overview: Happiness and loneliness haunts us all. Mork activates his time machine to age himself to be a companion to Mindy's grandmother after she feels all her friends have passed.

episodes.name: Mork's First Christmas
episodes.overview: Mork learns about Christmas, and his thoughtful gifts are unforgettable.

episodes.name: Mork and the Immigrant
episodes.overview: Mork meets an Immigrant from Russia and Mindy teaches Mork about democracy. An illegal alien has a new meaning for Mork.

episodes.name: Mork the Tolerant
episodes.overview: Mork and Mindy get a new neighbor and invite him to dinner, where Mork cooks.

episodes.name: Young Love
episodes.overview: Mork performs a wedding ceremony to marry his friend Eugene and his girlfriend.

episodes.name: Sky Flakes Keep Falling on My Head
episodes.overview: Mork and Mindy vacation in a cabin in the woods.

episodes.name: Mork Goes Erk
episodes.overview: Mork tells Mindy that he's been transferred to another planet and will be leaving in a few days.

episodes.name: Yes Sir, That's My Baby
episodes.overview: Mork wants to know more about where babies come from. A man offers to sell him one.

episodes.name: Mork's Mixed Emotions
episodes.overview: A kiss from Mindy brings out Mork's suppressed emotions.

episodes.name: Mork's Night Out
episodes.overview: When Mindy goes away for the weekend, Mork and Mr. Bickley go for a night out at a singles bar.

episodes.name: In Mork We Trust
episodes.overview: When Mr. Bickley steals Mork's age machine, he unknowingly causes Mork's age to change from that of a baby to middle aged.

episodes.name: Mork Runs Down
episodes.overview: Mork's attempt to find a new job is complicated by his 'birthday', a potentially fatal condition that causes him to behave stranger than usual unless he recharges himself with his egg-like 'gleek'.

episodes.name: It's a Wonderful Mork
episodes.overview: When Mork inadvertantly costs Mindy a potential job, he decides to return to Ork. Orson then shows him what would have happened to Mindy over the last year had Mork not been there.

episodes.name: Mork's Best Friend
episodes.overview: Mork gets a pet caterpillar which he names Bob.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: This is a list of episodes from the first season of Mork & Mindy.

episodes.name: Mork in Wonderland (1)
episodes.overview: Mork shrinks after taking a cold capsule.

episodes.name: Mork in Wonderland (2)
episodes.overview: While shrunk, Mork finds himself in an odd world.

episodes.name: Stark Raving Mork
episodes.overview: To keep excitement in his relationship with Mindy, Mork starts fights with her and then wants to kiss and make up.

episodes.name: Mork's Baby Blues
episodes.overview: Due to a misunderstanding about Monopoly money, gold-digger Kathy believes Mork is rich, and claims she is carrying his child.

episodes.name: Dr. Morkenstein
episodes.overview: Working as a security guard in a science museum, Mork befriends a robot.

episodes.name: Mork vs. Mindy
episodes.overview: After Mork and Mindy are hired as campaign workers by Mindy's cousin, Nelson Flavor, who is running for city councilman, they end up competing for the same job.

episodes.name: Mork Gets Mindy-itis
episodes.overview: Mork discovers he is allergic to Mindy, when he has uncontrollable fits of laughter (the Orkan equivalent to sneezing) around her.

episodes.name: A Morkville Horror
episodes.overview: On Halloween, Mork and Mindy believe the house she grew up in is haunted.

episodes.name: Mork's Health Hints
episodes.overview: While in the hospital, Mindy is mistakenly scheduled for brain surgery.

episodes.name: Dial 'N' for Nelson
episodes.overview: When Nelson receives threatening phone calls, Mork and Mindy investigate a shady club.

episodes.name: Mork vs. The Necrotons (1)
episodes.overview: Mork is romanced by another alien.

episodes.name: Mork vs. The Necrotons (2)
episodes.overview: Mork is threatened by another alien.

episodes.name: Hold That Mork
episodes.overview: Mork becomes a cheerleader for the Denver Broncos, making him pro football's first male cheerleader.

episodes.name: The Exidor Affair
episodes.overview: Exidor wants to propose to a meter maid and asks Mork for help.

episodes.name: The Mork Syndrome
episodes.overview: Mork goes on a secret mission for the Air Force.

episodes.name: Exidor's Wedding
episodes.overview: Exidor's mother shows up and tries to keep her son from getting married.

episodes.name: A Mommy for Mindy
episodes.overview: When Mindy's dad visits with a younger woman he has just married, Mork is happy, but Mindy is not.

episodes.name: The Night They Raided Mind-skis
episodes.overview: Mindy is targeted by a bigoted fanatical group.

episodes.name: Mork Learns to See
episodes.overview: When Mr. Bickley's blind son comes to visit, Mork learns to see the world differently.

episodes.name: Mork's Vacation
episodes.overview: Needing a vacation, Mork gets Orson's permission to swap bodies with other aliens.

episodes.name: Jeanie Loves Mork
episodes.overview: Mindy secretly writes for a newspaper's lonely hearts column and unknowingly gives advice to Jeanie, who then falls for Mork.

episodes.name: Little Orphan Morkie
episodes.overview: Mork could be deported, unless he marries an American or finds someone to adopt him.

episodes.name: Looney Tunes and Morkie Melodies
episodes.overview: Mork recruits his friends to turn the hour devoted to Nelson's 7am, Saturday morning campaign speech into a variety show for kids.

episodes.name: Clerical Error
episodes.overview: Mork thinks he is a priest when he dresses in a black jacket and white collar, and begins advising church parishioners.

episodes.name: Invasion of the Mork Snatchers
episodes.overview: When Mork becomes addicted to advertising, he becomes a ""buy-a-holic"", causing problems for Mindy.

episodes.name: The Way Mork Were
episodes.overview: When marital problems plague Mindy's father, he turns to Mork and Mindy for help.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: This is a list of episodes from the second season of Mork & Mindy.

episodes.name: Putting the Ork Back in Mork (1)
episodes.overview: Mindy's efforts to make Mork act like a normal earthling backfire, radically changing his personality. Orson sends the most respected Orkan elder to Earth to help Mork regain his Orkan traits.

episodes.name: Putting the Ork Back in Mork (2)
episodes.overview: The Elder (whose name is actually the sound of ""blowing a raspberry"") converts the attic to a typical Orkan house, hoping it will help Mork revert to his old Orkan ways.

episodes.name: Mork in Never Never Land
episodes.overview: Mork discovers that his penpal is living at an insane asylum, and believes that he is Peter Pan.

episodes.name: Dueling Skates
episodes.overview: When Wheels, the owner of the daycare center, announces plans to level the building, Mork challenges him to a skate-off through the city of Boulder.

episodes.name: Mork the Prankster
episodes.overview: Mindy teaches Mork about practical jokes, but Mork doesn't quite get the hang of pranks.  After a disastrous prank, Mindy moves out to live with Glenda Faye for awhile. Glenda convinces Mindy to take Mork back.

episodes.name: Mork, the Monkey's Uncle
episodes.overview: Mork kidnaps a chimp from the zoo, saying he was being treated badly.  Exidor investigates at the zoo and learns that the chimp's mother was rushed to the hospital.  Mork sneaks in to the zoo and reunites the chimp and it's mother.

episodes.name: Gunfight at the Mor-Kay Corral
episodes.overview: Mork dresses up as his favorite hero, Squellman the Yellow.  One boy at the day care idolizes Billy the Kid and starts immitating him in a dangerous game.  Mork and Mindy teach him a lesson about violence.

episodes.name: Mork's New Look
episodes.overview: Mindy's dad wants to get plastic surgery to look younger. He says everyone could use a little improvement, which inspires Mork to go to a plastic surgeon. His make-over surprises everyone.

episodes.name: Alas, Poor Mork, We Knew Him Well
episodes.overview: An insurance salesman scares Mork about dying from natural disasters. He seals himself into a glass bubble in the living room.

episodes.name: Mork and the Bum Rap
episodes.overview: Mork becomes a vagrant in order to help Mindy open a children's hospital.

episodes.name: Mindy Gets Her Job
episodes.overview: Mindy applies for a job at a TV station. After speaking her mind to the station manager, she get hired. A blizzard keeps newscasters from getting to the station, so Mindy has to do the whole newsshow herself, with help from Mork.

episodes.name: Twelve Angry Appliances
episodes.overview: Mindy has a broken record player that the repairman won't fix for a second time. Mork and Mindy want to get revenge on the repairman, so Mork puts him on trial before a jury of broken appliances.

episodes.name: There's a New Mork in Town
episodes.overview: Mork is beside himself when he hears that Xerko is coming from Ork to visit him. Xerko turns out to be an arrogant and egotistical man and he wants Mork's job of reporting back to Orson. Xerko and Mork duel to see who will get the job.

episodes.name: Mork Meets Robin Williams
episodes.overview: Robin Williams is in town and Mindy can't get an interview. Mork doesn't think he looks anything like Robin Williams, but he gets chased by a mob of fans. Mork gets Mindy and himself into Robin Williams' dressing room, leading to a face-to-face interview with him.

episodes.name: Mindy, Mindy, Mindy
episodes.overview: Mindy goes away for the weekend, and Mork goes crazy missing her. The Orkan elder comes to visit and regrets that Mindy isn't there. He tries to clone Mindy, but each clone is worse than the last.

episodes.name: Mork, the Swinging Single
episodes.overview: Mindy tells Mork she thinks they should date other people. He takes lessons from a swinger named T.N.T. and turns into a party animal.

episodes.name: Mork and Mindy Meet Rick and Ruby
episodes.overview: Remo fires Ruby, the pregnant singer of the restaurant's band. Mindy takes in Rick and Ruby and she tries to convince Remo to rehire them. She makes a bet with Remo, so he rehires the group. Ruby goes into labor during a performance and Mork takes her place.

episodes.name: Mork and the Family Reunion
episodes.overview: Fred's successful, but domineering brother, Dave, comes to dinner. Mindy accidentally eats an Orkan dessert which makes her behave strangely. Things get even worse when Uncle Dave eats some of the dessert.

episodes.name: Old Muggable Mork
episodes.overview: Grandma Cora comes to visit, but the trip takes a turn for the worse when she gets mugged. Cora feels very scared; Mork thinks up a plan to get even with the muggers.

episodes.name: I Heard It Through the Morkvine
episodes.overview: Mork learns about gossip after Mindy gets her own gossip show. Mindy thinks she won't be able to get those kinds of stories, so Mork gets some for her. While taking her place on the show, he spreads gossip about his friends. Mindy makes Mork apologize on the air; Mork also convinces Mr. Sternhagen to drop the show.

episodes.name: Mindy and Mork
episodes.overview: Mindy is working a lot and Mork can't adjust. Mork and Mindy switch places for a morning to see how the other feels.

episodes.name: Reflections and Regrets
episodes.overview: At Mr. Bickley's 50th birthday party, everyone shares what they regret in their life. Mindy makes excuses to put off her turn, but after everyone leaves, she shares her regret with Mork.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: This is a list of episodes from the third season of Mork & Mindy.

episodes.name: Limited Engagement (1)
episodes.overview: After decorating the apartment with flowers, Mork gets down on his knee and proposes to Mindy. Choosing between logic and her emotions, Mindy tells him that she cannot marry him. Mork asks for 24 hours to get her to change her mind.

episodes.name: The Wedding (2)
episodes.overview: Orson forbids Mork to marry Mindy because marriage is outlawed on Ork. Because Mork goes ahead with the wedding anyway, Orson turns him into a dog. After a chat with Orson, Mork and Mindy finally get married.

episodes.name: The Honeymoon (3)
episodes.overview: Mork and Mindy take their honeymoon on Ork, but Mindy becomes a tourist attraction. Things keep going wrong and Mork doesn't understand Earth honeymoon customs. He confesses to Mindy that he's scared of being married.

episodes.name: Three the Hard Way
episodes.overview: Dr. Exidor determines that Mork is pregnant. Mork gives birth to an egg via his navel. Mindy has trouble accepting that in the egg is their child. The egg grows and hatches a full grown, elderly man as Mork and Mindy's baby.

episodes.name: Mama Mork, Papa Mindy
episodes.overview: Mearth learns to walk and talk, but calls Mindy 'shoe'. Mindy starts avoiding Mearth until Mork gives her an opportunity to bond with her son.

episodes.name: My Dad Can't Beat Up Anybody
episodes.overview: Mork becomes insecure when he thinks he doesn't have Mearth's respect. Mearth finds Mork's spacesuit and Mork wears it as a superhero costume. Mork and Mearth go to a bar, looking for some bad guys and they find more than they bargained for.

episodes.name: Long Before We Met...
episodes.overview: Mork accompanies Mindy to her high school reunion and gets upset when Mindy associates with an old boyfirend.  Mork then attempts to go back in time to the prom and do away with the boyfriend and he succeeds.  When Mork comes back to reality Mindy then assures him that he is the only one she loves.

episodes.name: Rich Mork, Poor Mork
episodes.overview: Mork turns to Exidor for money advice, and invests all the family's money in Exidor's boutique.

episodes.name: Alienation
episodes.overview: Mork and Mindy tell Mearth he's an alien. Mearth gets upset and runs away. He's captured by a cult of Utopians and Mork and Mindy pretend to be part of the cult to rescue him.

episodes.name: P.S. 2001
episodes.overview: Mearth wants to go to school and gets sent to school on Ork. Mearth comes home crying because the other kids made fun of him and he hates the teacher. Mork and Mindy take Mearth back to class and Mearth uses his parents as a show-and-tell item which gains the respect of his classmates.

episodes.name: Pajama Game II
episodes.overview: Mearth is allowed to have some of his Orkan friends over and Zelka ends up spending the night. Mork and Mindy explain the facts of life to Mearth when they assume something happened between him and Zelka.

episodes.name: Present Tense
episodes.overview: Mearth goes on a trip with Fred so Mork and Mindy have a week to spend alone together. They find that without Mearth at home, they have nothing to talk about. They have a fight.  So, to make up, Mork takes Mindy to the place they first met.

episodes.name: Metamorphosis- the TV Show
episodes.overview: Mr. Sternhagen, the station manager where Mindy works, gets fired. KTNS's new boss is very young and ready to fire people. He holds a party to meet all the employees' families. A short circuit switches Mork's mind with Mearth's.

episodes.name: Drive, She Said
episodes.overview: Mindy is tired of coming from work and then having to go out on errands in the evening. Mork goes to a driving school where TNT is his instructor. When Mork takes his driving test, he thinks his examiner is the devil.

episodes.name: I Don't Remember Mama
episodes.overview: Mork has been making boring reports to Orson, so Orson erases all of Mork's memories of his family. Mindy and Mearth do everything they can to get Mork to remember them. Mindy finally breaks the memory dam by kissing him.

episodes.name: Mork, Mindy and Mearth Meet MILT
episodes.overview: Mork uses Orkan components to assemble a home computer named M.I.L.T.  MILT is so sophisticated and tyrannical that it decides to hold its creator, Mindy, and Mearth, as hostages.

episodes.name: Midas Mork
episodes.overview: After hearing about how Rumplestilskin spun straw into gold, Mork and Mearth try to make polyester into gold. Mindy dreams that they become millionaires and live in a mansion with servants.

episodes.name: Cheerleaders in Chains
episodes.overview: Mindy gets jailed when she won't reveal a source for one of her stories. Mork tries to go through political channels to get her out. Then he tries to spring her out, but gets arrested himself.

episodes.name: Gotta Run (1)
episodes.overview: Mork and Mindy are overjoyed when they meet Kalnik, an alien from Neptune who has also married an Earthling. Things go awry when they become suspicious of Kalnik's true intentions.

episodes.name: Gotta Run (2)
episodes.overview: After the evil Kalnik has bombed their apartment, leaving them on the run, Mork, Mindy, and Mearth decide their only chance of surviving is to go public about Mork's real roots.

episodes.name: Gotta Run (3)
episodes.overview: Kalnik discovers Mork, Mindy, and Mearth in their demolished apartment.   Mork clicks the heels of his magic shoes in an effort to escape with Mindy to Rome.  But the shoes have been damaged, and Mork and Mindy wind up with prehistoric tribesmen in an Okus cave.

episodes.name: The Mork Report
episodes.overview: Mork bucks hard for a promotion from leader Orson on planet Ork, and unintentionally comes up with a report on how to stay happily married on Earth.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: This is a list of episodes from the fourth and final season of Mork & Mindy.
